resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of theaining Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum
Image should be clicked in a well-lit room, with the face shown clearly to the camera.
Extreme darkness/brightness on the face might increase the BPCER.
The Face should be straight and not tilted.
Minimum Size of detected face should be 224X224 pixels.
Distance between eyes should be at least 100 pixels.
Any occlusions on parts of face like Glasses, Masks should be removed while performing Liveness Check/ Search.
The detected Face should occupy at least 20% of the total image area.
No image compression is highly recommended.
Oops!! some error occurred please try again
